casebody.data:
Vincent J. MASTANDUNO, Employee
v.
NATIONAL FREIGHT INDUSTRIES, Employer,
and
American Zurich Insurance Company, Carrier No. 20P18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 John M. Kirby, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Mastanduno, Vincent J. Bruce A. Hamilton, Attorney at Law, S. Scott Farwell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for National Freight Industries, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 2nd of November 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of November 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
